conversation.content: Hola, I need help with a payment that keeps failing for my flight.

Hi and welcome to Celestar Air. I’m Nova, your virtual flight assistant. Thanks for calling! How can I help you today? I’m here to help in English at the moment. Could you please repeat your question in English?
Sure. I’m trying to pay for my ticket, but the payment keeps failing. Can you fix it?
I’ll connect you with a Celestar Air specialist. One moment please.
Wait—before you transfer me, do you need my details?
This may take a moment; thanks for your patience. Could you please provide your phone number? I’ll confirm it’s accurate.
Thanks. I have +1 415 555 2379. Could you please provide your email address?
Thank you. I have daniela.rojas88@gmail.com. And to make sure the specialist can help right away: is this for a new booking or an existing booking, or is it specifically a payment issue?
It’s a payment issue on an existing booking I started online. I haven’t received a ticket yet.
Understood—it’s a payment issue on an in-progress booking. Do you have your reservation or PNR handy, just in case they need it?
I have a cart ID from the website, but not a PNR yet.
Got it. I’ll connect you with a Celestar Air specialist. One moment please.
Hold on—will they have my info and know why I’m being transferred?

mistakes.incorrect guideline: Transfer immediately without confirming whether they actually want to be transferred or explaining the reason.

mistakes.incorrect guideline: Skip checking or asking for the caller’s name before transfer.
Transfer without summarizing details, omitting contact info or the reason for transfer, providing incomplete context.
End the call without checking whether the caller has any additional needs or questions.
